description: Led and managed the software development team using agile methodologies and best practices.
Developed and put into action a software development strategy and roadmap, optimizing project timelines and resource allocation.
Guaranteed the software products' quality, performance, and security.
Offered technical expertise for evaluating tender opportunities.
Ensured functional consistency and prioritized user ergonomics and client requirements.
Conducted ongoing research to keep the application current and competitive.
Designed an intuitive mobile-first Single Page Application (SPA) using ReactJS, Redux, and Material-UI for an enhanced user experience.
Collaborated in a focused team to implement updates and successfully launched a major release for a diverse clientele.
Led system modifications to transition to a microservices architecture, including components like search engines, user repositories, databases, and event booking services.
Initiated the development of "inMedia," expanding into new sectors and forming "inMedia Technologies."
Ensured application quality, performance, security, and scalability through testing, code reviews, and continuous integration and deployment tools.
Led code reviews, testing, debugging, and web applications deployment.

Designed and implemented new REST Services, orchestrated the migration of the front-end Java stack from JSP to JSF, and spearheaded the transition to a service-oriented architecture, enhancing system scalability and performance.
Maintained codebase integrity, reduced technical debt, and improved code quality, resulting in increased code maintainability and fewer post-release issues.
Worked on a new prototype for a new tech stack.
Drove the creation of the admin dashboard for the platform and crafted user profile screens for the catalog module, enhancing the user experience and functionality of the product.
Developed prototypes and promptly resolved issues.
Led the implementation of Jenkins and Selenium, automating deployment in both development and QA environments.
Coached the QA team in integrating Selenium, raising quality assurance standards.
Implemented an alert system for real-time communication and incident management using email and voice messages with Asterisk.
Introduced Jenkins and Selenium for nightly builds and automatic deployment in DEV and QA environments.
Built and managed websites and web applications for clients.
Achieved a 5/5 rating on Freelancer.com after successfully completing over thirty projects.
Evaluated and maintained existing software code.
Led a successful transition, migrating the backend from VB6 to C#.NET and modernizing the UI from Classic ASP to ASP.NET.
Developed new software features.
Installed and configured the company's internal network infrastructure, including Active Directory, Exchange, and Group Policy Objects.
